title: O Light Of Light, Shine In!
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c v5 c v6 c

v1: O Light of light, shine in!
Cast out this night of sin,
O Light of light, shine in!
v2: O Joy of joys, come in!
End Thou this grief of sin,
O Joy of joys, come in!
v3: O Life of life, pour in!
O Life of life, pour in!
v4: O Love of love, flow in!
O Love of love, flow in!
v6: My God and Lord, O come!
Of joys the Joy and Sum,
Make in this heart Thy home:
My God and Lord, O come!
c1: To my poor heart come in!
